IsEnabled: If enabled, text from text files will be gathered according to this configuration.
SearchDirectories: The paths of directories to be searched recursively for text files, specified relative to the project's root, which may be parsed for text to gather.
ExcludePathWildcards: Text files whose paths match these wildcard patterns will be excluded from gathering.
FileExtensions: Text files whose names match these wildcard patterns may be parsed for text to gather.
ShouldGatherFromEditorOnlyData: If enabled, data that is specified as editor-only may be processed for gathering.
